content.rendered: Dr Raju Saginala, an MA Economics and PhD doctorate, with 14 years of experience in teaching Economics and Business has been working with Regent Group for past 8 years as a lecturer for both home and international students at HND levels 4-5. He worked for a year as a Course Leader at level 7 and 2 years as a Cohort leader. He has been performing the various roles of lecturer assessor and an internal verifier and has been actively working towards guiding students towards achieving their academic targets.
